biography: Ariane Ascaride (born 10 October 1954, Marseille is a French actress and screenwriter. She has appeared in such films as Marius et Jeannette (Marius and Jeannette), Ma vraie vie à Rouen (The True Story of My Life in Rouen; USA, My Life on Ice) and À la place du coeur (Where the Heart Is). She also starred in and co-wrote the screenplay for Le Voyage en Arménie (Armenia).
name: Ariane Ascaride
